name: The San Francisco School
description: The San Francisco School cultivates and celebrates the intellectual, imaginative, and humanitarian promise of each student in a community that practices mutual respect, embraces diversity, and inspires a passion for learning. - Serves: Preschool - 8th grade Curriculum includes: - Adventure Playground - Athletics - Community Center - Environmental Sustainability - Extended Day - The Kitchen - Library Services - School Bus - Summer programs
